StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [sp_TestAddRecruitTraining]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@ShipID int, @ShipDate date.me, @UserLogin varchar(15) = 'SA' AS
--- MAKE SURE THE SSN BELONGS TO A SHIPPER WHO DOES NOT HAVE A RECRUIT TRAINING RECORD IF NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM RECRUIT_TRAINING RT WHERE RT.SHIP_ID = @ShipID) BEGIN --- INSERT THE RECRUIT TRAINING DATA INSERT INTO RECRUIT_TRAINING (SHIP_ID, SHIP_DATE, USER_LOGIN, UPDATE_DATE) VALUES (@ShipID, @ShipDate, @UserLogin, GETDATE()) END ELSE BEGIN UPDATE RECRUIT_TRAINING SET SHIP_DATE = @ShipDate, USER_LOGIN = @UserLogin, UPDATE_DATE = GETDATE() WHERE SHIP_ID = @ShipID END
